Reviews.Content: searched searched hotel recent berlin visit christmas week cozy character charm nice oldfashioned christmas vibe convenient location hoped moment entered chocolate santa pillow darling comfortable sleep shower bathroom recently lovely sons shared hall spacious boast wood floors ceilings chandeliers ornate mirrors furniture unique front desk staff welcoming helpful lobby faux fireplaces comfy furniture nice sit grab beer glass wine available honor system sign book youve especially loved adjoining restaurant breakfast included rate typically german breads rolls homemade jams wonderful ate dinner twice food marvelous love lit table breakfast short walk hop train walk wherever youre looking deluxe chainhotel ambience services look elsewhere dime dozen hope someday

Reviews.Title: “A flavour of Old Berlin in a modern style”
Reviews.Author: TravelManGlasgow
Reviews.Content: nonchain hotel residential city nice staff spacious ceilings lots character wooden floors creaky chandaliers ornate wooden dark wood lots 19th art youve bit flavour hotel hotels origins date 1920 rebuilt destroyed war decrepit manner means breakfasts substantial bit plain muesli ive seen unappealing scrambled eggs various forms soso sausages bread croissants salmon fresh boiled eggs bathroom topnotch quality shower sink lights tiling mattress comfortable pillow square curtains lined block light overall hotel real character nice district five minutes walk

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing at this price”
Reviews.Author: Brightontraveller-2
Reviews.Content: elegant wellsituated hotel restaurant prices rise expectations main issue value money elegant decor bit kitsch gilt framed pictures bathroom frills eg soap dispenser shower remained empty 2 days visit towels inadequate location quiet sidestreet weather hot sunny ac blinds windows hot night sleeping difficult inclusive buffet breakfast restaurant door ok standard hotels price range irritated receptionists insistence payment cash advance checking

Reviews.Content: loved stay restaurant fabulous reasonable staff helpful courteous pretty bathrooms perfect complaint hotel absolutely standard pillows oversized slightly soft european pillows didnt comfortable internet bit spotty free
